Contact Us

A&A CubeSat Team

For Students:

If you're an undergraduate or graduate student at the University of Washington interested in joining our team, this is the place to start! We are always looking for motivated students at all levels.

Here are the best ways to get in touch with us:
  • Email us at aact@uw.edu. Be sure to include:
    • Academic status (undergrad, Master's or Ph.D.) and home department,
    • A copy of your resume,
    • A quick description of why you're interested in joining our team,
    • If possible, highlight relevant experience. This is not a requirement but it helps us get a sense of how you'd fit into our project!
  • Drop by the Engineering Design Lab in AERB 023.
  • Github
  • © W.E Boeing Department of Aeronautics and Astronautics
